inclusion.criterion: recruited from the PI's private practice
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: able and willing to undergo a noninvasive 24 hour pH probe study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: history of surgical treatment for reflux disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: history of allergic or adverse reaction to Prevacid
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has Parkinson's disease, but this does not seem to be a contraindication for the study. He is an alert and cooperative man who does not have any signs of dementia.
